org.agilewiki.utils.immutable.collections

Interface MapNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Releasable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapNodeImpl, MapReference

    public interface MapNode
extends Releasable
    An immutable map of lists.

    • Method Summary
